p: The main aim of the work was to analyze the quantitative and qualitative characteristics of raspberry seeds oil. This review also proposes an overview of the possible RSO processing technologies and quality factors, pros and cons, significance of RSO for human health, nutrition and cosmetical value. Starting from this, an analysis of the most recent international patents related to RSO was carried out, in order to provide farmers, company managers, customers and other stakeholders an insight into the most suitable solution for the economic and environmental sustainability of the raspberry seeds oil in management chain.
